update.releaseNotes:
Changelogs- This is actually a modified version of 1.8 because I don't have my laptop right now.
•Added 1.19.21 download support. •Optimized Version.
Bugs in modded version-
•Autoupdate installation won't work(You need to install manually by going to Android/data/com.farizmcpe.mcdownloader/app.apk
• You can't install this without uninstalling previous version (1.7) because of signature issue.
•You can't update to next version (2.0) without uninstalling this version because of signature issue.
